spec.name: Volkswagen Garage
spec.description: The Volkswagen Garage Building is a historical industrial structure, dating from the **1950s**. It represents the functionalist and modernist architecture applied to automotive commercial facilities in the post-war era. As a dealership or service center for Volkswagen, it reflects the growing internationalization of Morocco's automotive market.

timeline.title: Construction Period
timeline.description: The garage building was completed (Approximate date).

access.comment: Access is restricted to clients and staff.
